UlrichDialogue2: ^[You hand Ulrich the nasal spray, and he doesn't waste a second before taking a hit of it.]
^[A few coughs and sniffs later, he clears his throat.]
^Any longer and I would've suffocated to death like some sad sack of-
^And who are you? Do I know you?

g-0: ^You wouldn't recognize me, I'm new here. The name's Cleo.
^I guess I owe you now, so what do you want?
g-1: ^Right, right. You're here about the upgrade. I'm on it.
^[Ulrich shuffles over to your boat and installs the upgrade.]
^I have work to get to. Whatever else you got to say, make it quick.
g-2: ^I was told my parents passed through this archipelago a long time ago.
^Have you seen them at all? Do you know where they might've gone?
^Listen, kid. My memory ain't what it used to be. I can't remember everyone that passed by.
^[While speaking harshly, there's something about Ulrich's eyes that soften.]
g-3: ^[Ulrich mumbles something under his breath before coughing once again.]
^[Looks like the nasal spray is wearing off...]
